extendedInfo.description: IU SHAKE takes you to a new experience of enjoying music! Tap & Shake your fingers to the music by the most lovable teenage singer youâve ever seen! Millions of fingers are already dancing to the music from SHAKE! Join the fun NOW and get LIMITED TIME OFFER! ----------------------------------- Tap & Shake to the music! IU SHAKE offers traditional âTAPâ style of gameplay as well as a new âSHAKE-WHEELâ mode, using a seamless-gesture technology developed by dooub. The âSHAKE-WHEELâ mode will make you feel like a DJ scratching the turntable! Introducing Card Deck System! IU SHAKE rewards you cards when you complete a game. These cards can be collected, which include unreleased pictures of IU, or they can be used in game like an item and receive higher scores! ----------------------------------- Contact Us Twitter @MusicianSHAKE Facebook www.facebook.com/iushake

reviews.title: Lost all datas after update
reviews.comment: After updating my phone to Android Jelly Bean. All of the data in my IU SHAKE app are lost. My card collection dissappears and on top of that the sonfs I have paid money to buy are all gone. How can I fix this? Please help.
reviews.author: Minh Doan

reviews.title: Helpful
reviews.comment: After installing the update,it works! Thanks for the help!
reviews.author: Lindy Lau

reviews.title: It\'s frozen! Please fix it!
reviews.comment: This IU game is  frozen...it worked for me before..but now the song just plays without being able play the game reinstalled it and still the same problem! Please fix this problem!!!

reviews.title: Bug in the game???
reviews.comment: Its frozen... I can\'t play... and when I try another song it plays the previous song... please fix...

reviews.comment: Every single time i play thia game it always lags and takes forever to load. When in playing it decides to stop and do that 321 thing and i end up missing like 5. Fix this NOW!!!!!

reviews.title: Good...... sort of
reviews.comment: It\'s good, but I cant play Peach. The screen goes white, but the song keeps going on in the background. Then the game ends because I \"missed too much notes\" The other songs are fine though, it\'s just Peach thats weird for me.

reviews.title: The only good thing is IU ....
reviews.comment: This app is bad .. in term of app. Seems an amateur work... the only good thing is IU songs and pics.  Not came with even one full song .. which make it even worse.

reviews.title: Neh......
reviews.comment: Well...I don\'t really care about full song BUT when I try to play Good Day in easy level, the page loaded and goes black then it crashes and I have to restart it. Then when I try normal, the song isnt Good Day. It\'s Sleeping Prince. But overall it\'s good though. Keep up good work and thanks for the game :)
